rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with eco-friendly flooring and natural lighting.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen, featuring large windows for optimal daylighting and cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
An open-plan kitchen connected to the living area, designed for energy efficiency and equipped with sustainable appliances.
A landscaped courtyard acting as a natural ventilation core and promoting indoor air quality, aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Eco-friendly bathroom featuring water-saving fixtures and natural light access.
A utility area for eco-friendly appliances and storage solutions with energy-efficient design elements.

openings.description: A front door designed for optimal security and natural ventilation from the entrance hall to living areas.
Balconies with eco-friendly railings that provide outdoor access from key rooms.
Large windows strategically placed to maximize sunlight and cross ventilation across living and kitchen areas, adhering to Vastu principles.
Access point leading to the swimming pool area located on the terrace level.
